title: Can you give an example of an indisputable absolute truth? - Quora

response.answer_text: You are standing on the edge of a 410 foot cliff and now jump off the edge of said cliff. Now most people will let their thoughts go wild with injury, dismemberment and death type thoughts. Now the reality is you will fall 410 feet any other results are just side factors. Any injury, dismemberment or death is not guaranteed, it is very likely but not guaranteed.

The only indisputable truths are a priori or tautological statements i.e. true by definition: All circles are round You don't know what you don't know These tend to be trivial in nature; although tautologies, like the one above, can be more profound at second glance. It speaks to the unawareness of one's own ignorance. It is similar to Pasteur's observation “A bit of science distances one from God, but much science nears one to Him.”
It is what it is. We are not as young as we used to be. What will be, will be.
